BR_text.BRsummary: Cannot change background color with vis-gui.py example
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 I'm trying to use the new GUI module for point cloud visualizations, but am having trouble with changing the background color. In the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/blob/master/examples/python/GUI/vis-gui.py>vis-gui.py example</denchmark-link>
 , I cannot get the background color to change at all despite selecting a new background color with the "BG Color" color picker.
 I have also tried hard-coding line 135 of vis-gui.py to choose a different initial background color, which does not work either.
 To Reproduce
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
 I built open3d from source today (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/commit/e3f0edb65770baeb6a08225c257b124764af4e87>e3f0edb</denchmark-link>
 ) and ran the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/blob/master/examples/python/GUI/vis-gui.py>vis-gui.py example</denchmark-link>
  with a pcd file and tried to change the background color with the "BG Color" color picker.
 Expected behavior
 Expected the background color to change.
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16779401/92165900-9e2c7580-edec-11ea-91ac-9b53145a6170.png></denchmark-link>
 
 Environment (please complete the following information):
 
 Operating system: OSX 10.15.6
 Python version: Python 3.7.1
 Open3D version: From source (Commit: e3f0edb)
 Is this remote workstation?: no
 How did you install Open3D?: build from source
 Compiler version (if built from source): Apple clang 11.0.3

comments_0.comment_text:
I think this was caused by moving to Filament 1.8 from 1.4.5, which changed how the background color is set, and the example didn't get updated. Fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/pull/2299>#2299</denchmark-link>
 .
